author: Special Correspondent
text:
A legal awareness camp was held in the hill station of Yercaud on Saturday. The camp was organised by the Salem District Legal Services Authority.

M. Jothiraman, First Additional District Judge, presided over the meeting.

V. Ravichandran, Sub-Judge and Secretary of the Salem District Legal Service Authority, and a host of lawyers explained the steps to be taken by the people belonging to tribal community in getting the relevant government documents, dealing with the cases relating to family disputes, property right, right to education, rights of senior citizens, rights of the unorganised sector workers etc.
title: Legal awareness camp
